This fucking laugh. This theme already was already way too Dancing Mad before. Now everyone probably had Final Fantasy VI memories. :p

author: Atle Bjelkerud

text:
Wait, what the heck?! Are you sure you didn't upload the wrong track, Supradarky? Well, then again, I guess I wouldn't believe Galactica Knight's theme was from Kirby...Â 
I haven't really played a ton of Kirby games - I've only played Squeak Squad, Dream Land, Superstar Ultra, and Return to Dreamland - and I think Return to Dreamland is my most favourite of the series. If the series really is getting better with every game, I'm looking forward to seeing how good Triple Deluxe will turn out.Â
